reporter.translation[0].definitions[0].d: someone whose job is to write about news events for a newspaper, or to tell people about them on television or on the radio
reporter.translation[0].note_box[0].sect: The case attracted newspaper reporters from all over the world.
He told television reporters that he had no plans to resign.
He started as a news reporter on Radio 1.
Pinchetti became the magazine's top political reporter.
Two investigative reporters wrote an article linking the CIA to cocaine trafficking in Los Angeles.
